jobDescription: Our client is a leader in the Healthcare Industry with over 200,000 employees across the United States. They are currently hiring their Large-scale Healthcare Business Data Analyst Reports financial status by preparing and analyzing financial plans, forecasts, and reports.Complete complex financial models for decision making purposes.Act as the financial laision/consultant to various business units within the healthcare organization.Essential Responsibilities:Tracks financial status by monitoring variances from plan.Determines financial status by comparing and analyzing plans and forecasts with actual results.Improves financial status by analyzing results and variancesIdentifying trendsRecommend actions.Receives general direction for work that is reviewed upon completion. participates in determining objectives of assignments, plans, etc.Will be involved in special projects and/or participate in training and development efforts.Reconciles transactions by comparing and correcting data.Increases productivity by developing automated applicationsEliminating duplicationsCoordinating information requirements.Qualifications:Prior experience in a large health care or insurance industry setting is requiredMBA or MSF.Minimum of intermediate SQL skillsExperience with financial modelingGenerally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP).Demonstrated the ability to create meaningful financial reports that are actionable.Familiarity of financial transaction flow within operational and financial systems.Proficient in Microsoft Office applications.Excellent verbal, written and presentation communication skills.Proven analytical ability.Excellent customer service and organizational skills.Ability to identify and solve problems.
